body: @yongni : this is a hack for building Ruby 1.0.1 image. Do you think we should check in this hack?

Tested so far manually, 

```
tools/interop_matrix/run_interop_matrix_tests.py --release=v1.0.1 --language all
``` 

looks is green when running manually on this PR, and ruby runs as well.
